overview: Andap is a documentary that narrates the hardships of, not only being diagnosed with, but also taking care of someone who is diagnosed with Alzheimer’s. Alzheimer’s is a brain disease that causes individuals to lose their memory, which progressively worsens as they get older. Step into the eyes of Aling Tuding, an 83-year old senior citizen diagnosed with Alzheimer’s, and Peachy Jimeño, Aling Tuding’s daughter and caretaker, as they tell the story of how the disease changed their lives.
title: Andap
